sections.title: Backstage Consulting & Adoption Strategy
sections.description: We guide you through the entire Backstage adoption journey — from project scoping to onboarding your team. With experience in CNCF’s platform engineering maturity model, we know what it takes to build and deploy successful internal developer platforms.
offerings: Expert guidance on best practices, tailored solutions, integrations, and plugins specific to your business needs.
Dedicated consulting to create a roadmap ensuring Backstage aligns with your organizational goals.

sections.title: Implement Production-Grade Backstage
sections.description: We specialize in deploying production-ready Backstage instances, allowing your teams to focus on core business priorities.
offerings: Design and deploy a tailored Backstage platform to optimize collaboration and streamline development workflows.
Guidance on infrastructure selection, dependencies, data models, backups, compliance, security, and monitoring.

sections.title: Integration with Tools & Workflows
sections.description: Backstage serves as the central hub for software development by integrating seamlessly with your existing tools and processes.
offerings: Identify which steps Backstage covers natively and where integrations are required.
Integrate Backstage with existing systems to ensure smooth data flow and enhanced development efficiency.

sections.title: Backstage Support & Training
sections.description: Ongoing support ensures your IDP remains productive, preventing downtime and trial-and-error delays.
offerings: Enterprise-level support to resolve issues and keep Backstage running smoothly.
Training sessions and documentation to equip teams with the knowledge to maximize Backstage usage.

sections.title: Scalability Planning
sections.description: Our Backstage solutions are built for growth, managing increasing users, software, and workflow complexities without compromising performance.
offerings: Develop scalability plans to handle increased demand efficiently.
Ensure integrations, plugins, and workflows scale securely and remain compliant.

sections.title: Security & Compliance Integration
sections.description: We embed security and compliance checks into your Backstage instance, ensuring software development adheres to industry standards.
offerings: Implement best practices for authentication, data encryption, secure plugins, and password policies.
Document security and compliance procedures to train new team members and maintain standards.
